meanings.definition: Surveils: to watch closely or observe
meanings.sent1: The security camera surveils the parking lot for any suspicious activity.
meanings.sent2: She carefully surveils the progress of her plants to ensure they are growing well.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat surveils the birds outside the window with great interest.
meanings.sent4: The moon surveils the Earth, silently observing its beauty from afar.
meanings.sent5: The detective surveils the suspect, waiting for the perfect moment to make an arrest.

meanings.definition: Surveils: the act of monitoring or observing closely
meanings.sent1: The security team constantly surveils the building to prevent any unauthorized access.
meanings.sent2: The scientist surveils the experiment to record any unexpected results.
meanings.sent3: The robot surveils the factory floor, ensuring all machines are working efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The owl surveils the forest at night, its keen eyes watching for movement.
meanings.sent5: The teacher surveils the students during the test to prevent cheating.
